job_tasks.phrase: Je bent een developer die bouwt aan Pontifexx Paddock, ons digitale platform voor Asset Management.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core responsibility of building and developing a digital platform, which falls under traditional software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Met jouw technische expertise help je de organisatie groeien en maak je het verschil door het ontwikkelen van krachtige, gebruiksvriendelijke applicaties.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the development of applications and contributing to organizational growth through technical expertise, aligning with software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Daarnaast pak je praktijkgerichte issues en verbetervoorstellen op die door onze klanten worden aangedragen en zorg je voor een passende oplossing.
job_tasks.justification: Addressing customer-driven issues and providing solutions is a typical software development task related to maintenance and improvement.

job_tasks.phrase: Je werkt nauw samen met onze specialisten op het gebied van Maintenance, IFS Ultimo, AI en BI om nieuwe functies en koppelingen te realiseren die onze dienstverlening versterken.
job_tasks.justification: Realizing new features and integrations is a direct software development and integration task.

job_tasks.phrase: In deze functie krijg je de kans om de bestaande technische basis van Pontifexx Paddock verder uit te bouwen.
job_tasks.justification: Expanding the existing technical foundation of a platform is a core software development activity.

job_tasks.phrase: We hanteren al een moderne stack bestaande uit verschillende frameworks en cloudservices, maar we staan open voor jouw inbreng om deze nóg beter te maken.
job_tasks.justification: Improving an existing tech stack, which involves frameworks and cloud services, is a software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Je hebt dus de ruimte om met nieuwe ideeën te komen en samen met het team te bepalen welke technische verbeteringen echt verschil maken.
job_tasks.justification: Coming up with new ideas for technical improvements and determining their impact is part of the software development lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: Zo draag je bij aan best practices, performance optimalisaties en de toekomstige richting van ons platform.
job_tasks.justification: Contributing to best practices, performance optimizations, and the future direction of a platform are all software development responsibilities.

soft_skills.phrase: Je werkt nauw samen met onze specialisten op het gebied van Maintenance, IFS Ultimo, AI en BI om nieuwe functies en koppelingen te realiseren die onze dienstverlening versterken.
soft_skills.justification: The phrase 'Je werkt nauw samen met onze specialisten' (You work closely with our specialists) indicates collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: Je hebt dus de ruimte om met nieuwe ideeën te komen en samen met het team te bepalen welke technische verbeteringen echt verschil maken.
soft_skills.justification: The phrase 'Je hebt dus de ruimte om met nieuwe ideeën te komen' (You have the space to come up with new ideas) suggests innovation and taking initiative.

soft_skills.phrase: Met jouw technische expertise help je de organisatie groeien en maak je het verschil door het ontwikkelen van krachtige, gebruiksvriendelijke applicaties.
soft_skills.justification: Helping the organization grow and making a difference through application development implies understanding business needs and aligning technical solutions.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses entirely on traditional software development tasks, such as building and improving a digital platform, developing applications, addressing issues, and implementing new features and integrations. There is no mention of specific AI/ML model development, fine-tuning, prompt engineering, RAG, or related specialized AI tasks. While AI and BI are mentioned as part of the platform's combination, the role itself is described as a developer building the platform, not an AI specialist. Therefore, it fits the 'Software Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about the responsibilities being traditional software development. There are no ambiguous statements or mentions of AI/ML specific tasks that would suggest a different profile. The role is clearly defined as a developer building a platform that *uses* AI/BI, rather than a role focused on developing or specializing in AI/ML itself.
